title: Meditation: Refuge in Presence (2020-09-23)
itunes:title: Meditation: Refuge in Presence
description: Meditation: Refuge in Presence (2020-09-23) - The movement from virtual reality – thoughts - to the awareness of sense-based reality is true homecoming. This meditation guides us in awakening our senses, and returning again and again to the freedom of embodied presence. We close with part of a poem “Come Home” by Jane Hooper.
